Title: Janus
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Heather Bellson, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor), Yasemin Yilmaz (staff writer)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Kurt Egyiawan, Li Jun Li
Plot: Tomas and Marcus help a troubled young woman in rural Montana and a malevolent presence targets one of the children in a foster home.
